official_title: Healing of the Esophageal Mucosa After Radiofrequency Ablation of Barrett's Esophagus
inclusion_criteria:
- Barrett's esophagus
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* inability to provide informed consent
* esophageal varices
* treatment with warfarin
* coagulopathy that precludes safe biopsy of the esophagus (including platelet count <100,000/mm3, INR (international normalized ratio) >1.5)
* allergy to fluorescein sodium
* comorbidity that precludes safe participation in the study
* pregnancy or breastfeeding status
